meanings.definition: The breaking down of fats by hydrolysis.
meanings.sent1: Lipolyses helps our bodies use stored fat for energy.
meanings.sent2: Proper lipolyses is essential for maintaining a healthy weight.
meanings.sent3: After a big meal, lipolyses gets to work breaking down all those extra fats.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of the bulge, lipolyses is the hero that fights against excess fat.
meanings.sent5: The magic of lipolyses transforms fat into fuel for our bodies.

meanings.definition: The process of breaking down fat cells.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise can boost lipolyses and help reduce fat cells.
meanings.sent2: Obesity can be a result of imbalanced lipolyses in the body.
meanings.sent3: When lipolyses is on vacation, fat cells throw a party and multiply.
meanings.sent4: Lipolyses acts like a demolition crew, breaking down fat cells one by one.
meanings.sent5: The power of lipolyses lies in its ability to shrink fat cells and trim our waistlines.
